text:
I am a student in second year of ESIR. I learn computer sciences, wtih the Internet of Things option. I would like to have some help for my project.
After 3 years of study, I know that computer engineer is not the job that would make me happy or proud. Therefore I tried to think about my future and to the things I can do after I finish my 5 years of study. I search into my hobbies and passion to find what could be great. I love board games and board games shops, so I want to try it by myself. I would like to build my own board games shop.
I did an internship and worked for my uncle, who own his business. He build a themed indoor park, based on school. Each room is about a different subject that everyone know in school, like maths, sports, music, and players have to play a mini game to earn points. Then they change room and try a different mini game. I learn a lot of things with this professionnal experience, about how to build a business plan, how to recruit people, how to advertise, how to work in team. This experience make me think about trying another way than juste serve a company for 40 years. I would like to build my own job like my uncle, except that it is in a project known by everybody. Board games shops are common and everywhere, but there is only two of them in Paris.
For the begining, i would like to build only a board games shop, then i would like to make it host event, like tournament or juste free play session for people who want to try some games before buy it. I think it can be very interesting, I think something like this is missing in Paris. There are baord games bar, but you can't buy games immediatly after play. I would like to promote second hand games, buy it from people who don't need them anymore and sell them with great discount. It is also an ecological process.
I'm asking for financial helping in order to learn about the creation of a business. I would like to make formation to learn during my last year of study. I will have to work in the ESIR and by myself, therefore I will not be able to have a job beside my studies.
I am convinced that this job project is better for me, because it was a deception to discover the engineer work during my studies or my internship. I know that this is a unstable path but I will be way more invest in this work than in any other work.
Thank you for your attention.
